message.content:
cs.MM, cs.NI, cs.CV, cs.IT, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.MM (Multimedia): The paper proposes a scheme for streaming 360-degree immersive videos to maximize the quality of experience (QoE). This falls under the domain of multimedia.
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper deals with streaming videos over the internet and proposes an algorithm to optimize the streaming rate. This falls under the domain of networking and internet architecture.
- cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): The paper assumes the knowledge of the viewing probability of different portions (tiles) of a panoramic scene. This requires computer vision techniques to estimate the field of view (FOV) of the user.
- cs.IT (Information Theory): The paper proposes a stochastic optimization framework to maximize the QoE of streaming 360-degree videos. This falls under the domain of information theory.
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper proposes an algorithm to optimize the streaming rate of 360-degree videos in the presence of uncertain head movement and bandwidth. This falls under the domain of systems and control.
